How do i add these. I am tired of trying to do all of this and have basically nothing in extra power like i was hoping for…

item.title: Quick question?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:


Alright, i have this coded for that class tho:

    public void DClawsSpecial() {
        if (IsAttackingNPC && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 13664) {
            setAnimation(0x426);
            actionTimer = 4;
            SpecDamgNPC(80);
            DDS2Damg = true;
            DDStimer = 1;
            resetAnimation();
            teleportToX = absX;
            teleportToY = absY;
            SpecDamgNPC(80);
            SpecialDelay -= 3;
        } else if (IsAttacking && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 13664) {
            int j = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX;
            int k = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY;
            int l = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerLevel[playerHitpoints];

            SpecDamg(80);
            DDS2Damg = true;
            DDStimer = 1;
            startAnimation(0x426);
            actionTimer = 4;
            teleportToX = absX;
            teleportToY = absY;
            SpecialDelay -= 3;
        }
    }

is there something immissing?? because im completely lost and i folowed a tut step by step… and thats ALL thats wrong…

Read full topic
